DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter study design evaluate safety , tolerability immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine healthy child age 15 month le 18 year .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine ( 13vPnC ) Healthy Children Aged 15 Months 17 Years
DOC.criteria: Male female subject > 15months < 18years good health , available entire study period reachable phone , parents/legal guardian able willing complete study procedure , write documentation health professional showing prior vaccination Prevnar ( except group 4 ) . Group 4 : Negative urine pregnancy test female subject menstruate . Previous reaction contraindication pneumococcal vaccine vaccine relate component , bleed diathesis , receive blood transfusion blood related product , immune deficiency , congenital malformation . Group 4 : Previous vaccination Prevnar pneumococcal vaccine . Pregnant breastfeed adolescent female .
